 New Features: 
 
* It is possible to target a token in the SAN LOSS button of the NPC sheet /n* By pressing the Update button in the PC sheet, all the checked skills are increased by 1d4-1 points. The skills are also automatically unchecked /n* All rolls now have a roll query that allows for modified rolls, by default no modifier is added.
